CustomField.formula: RecordType.Name = 'Pipeline Client' && TEXT(Status__c) = 'Active' && NOT(ISNULL(Go_Live_Date__c)) && Name != 'Abstrakt Marketing Group'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Temp field created by Jessica to demonstrate which accounts are populated by Batch Account Metrics vs Batch Pipeline Account Metrics
CustomField.label: Batch Pipeline Account Metrics
